data.title: Ethereum Support Band Under Pressure ‚Äî Can Bulls Revive Momentum From $3,700?
data.description:

With momentum fading after repeated rejections near resistance, speculations are whether buyers can step in to spark a renewed push upward or if a deeper correction is on the horizon.
